Menace
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Moebius D & J.
{2}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token with break. [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.)[/i]
